displayName.description: Human-readable name for the template (e.g., 'Salesforce Record List')

description.description: Detailed description of what the template provides and its capabilities

useCase.description: Clear guidance on when to use this template (e.g., 'Use this template when you need to display a list of Salesforce records with search and navigation capabilities')

features.description: Array of feature tags that describe template capabilities (e.g., ['record-list', 'search', 'detail-view', 'offline-sync'])

complexity.description: Relative complexity level for LLM adaptation and user understanding

files.description: Array of file paths that need modification

instructions.description: Step-by-step instructions for implementing the customization

customizationPoints.description: Key points where the template can be adapted for different use cases

step.description: Description of the prerequisite step to perform before cloning

required.description: Whether this step is required before cloning (default: true)

steps.description: List of prerequisite steps to perform before cloning the template

templateProperties.description: Properties to inject into the template at clone time. Each property can be a simple value (optional) or an object with value, required flag, and description.

required.description: Whether this property is required (default: false)

description.description: Description of what this property is used for

templatePrerequisites.description: Prerequisite steps and template properties required before cloning the template
